data.name: adduser
data.value: Create a new local user acccount

data.name: adduser.id
data.value: The ID of the new account

data.name: an
data.value: The name must be alphanumeric only

data.name: avert
data.value: The name must be composed of alphanumeric characters (dashes allowed) between 2 and 15 characters but without specials characters and spaces

data.name: bkcloudhost
data.value: Driver backups are hosted on my SharePoint

data.name: bkcloudhostdesc
data.value: You can download driver backup manually and submit your driver backup

data.name: boottray
data.value: Launch Unowhy Tools tray at startup

data.name: camoverena
data.value: Enable camera privacy indicator (Virtual camera LED)

data.name: conv.nout
data.value: This is not an Unowhy Tools driver backup

data.name: convdesc
data.value: Convert an old backup (<18.0) to the new format

data.name: descaadleave
data.value: Disconnect this PC from AzureAD/EntraID to disable the management of this PC (Intune / Endpoint) and disable "Other users" option. Warning : If you are using your AzureAD account ( [ID]@[DOMAIN] ) on this PC, you will no longer be able to connect to your account and you will lose your data of your account (if you attempt to reconnect to your account, you will get "wrong password" error)! Before, you need to backup your data, delete the local ".\ENT" account, disable the local ".\administrateur" account and create a local admin account !!!

data.name: descadduser
data.value: Create a new local user (account) on this PC. This allows you to no longer depend on AzureAD. I recommend you to switch to a local account (into the PC) and no longer go through the AzureAD account ( [ID]@[DOMAIN] )

data.name: descadmin
data.value: Set this account as local admin. With this, you can accept admin rights by clicking "Yes" without entering ".\administrateur"

data.name: descadminset
data.value: Manage the built-in ".\administrateur" account. Don't disable the admin account if you don't have an other account as admin ! So before, create a local account as admin or set this account as admin

data.name: descbcdfail
data.value: Remove "IgnoreAllFailures" (BootStatusPolicy) in BCD, to re-enable blue screen "Recovery" (Not WinRE/BootIM) and diagnostics ("Please wait") in case of boot issue, also allows to boot with a different behavior ( Safe Mode, Low Resolution, and more)

data.name: descbkcloud
data.value: Restore a Unowhy Tools driver backup from cloud made by another user. If you have an driver issue and if you haven't made a backup of your drivers, you can try to restore a cloud backup

data.name: descbootim
data.value: Repair BootIM (Boot Immersive Menu) (Blue Menu). Unowhy deployed a patch to disable bootim.exe, via bootim.exe redirection. If you want to boot from a USB device with a locked BIOS, do this

data.name: desccamoverena
data.value: Enable camera privacy indicator (Virtual camera LED). Windows 10/11 contain a features to indicate you with a popup overlay, if the camera is used, when the camera is turned on/off. By default, this feature is disabled, because, the most of laptop/webcam has an physical LED indicator. I don't know, why OEM (for exemple, UNOWHY) doesn't enable this feature (Windows cannot detect if a LED is present, and can't auto enable-it)

data.name: desccru
data.value: A tool to customize graphics driver to apply custom resolution and refresh rate

data.name: descdelentf
data.value: Delete extra softwares installers folder (In : C:\ProgramData)

data.name: descdeloem
data.value: Delete the first logon script, start menu icons and wallpapers (In : C:\Windows\System32)

data.name: descdismbr
data.value: This tools is currently in test (in beta) but probably work. Backup and Restore drivers with DISM. Always make a backup of drivers in order to fix possibly drivers problems. This will backup or restore all your system drivers with DISM commands from a user friendly GUI

data.name: descedgeset
data.value: Microsoft Edge settings. Uninstall the Chromium based Edge browser and block the auto reinstall. Warning: Uninstalling edge can break some features of Windows like web result in Windows Search or Windows Copilot. 2nd Warning: This tool doesn't uninstall Edge WebView2, I don't recommand you to uninstall WebView2 because a lots of apps work with WebView2 like Unowhy Tools (for change log), Visual Studio and more...

data.name: descent
data.value: Delete "ENT" local account. This the account to configure your "ENT" account

data.name: descenwhe
data.value: Enable Windows Hello for Enterprise. If you want to unlock your PC with the fingerprint reader and if it's disabled by administrator, do this.

data.name: deschackbgrtset
data.value: HackBGRT settings. HackBGRT is a small open source EFI loader that spoof UEFI logo for Windows Boot Manager. To simplify-it, it's a software to change Windows boot logo, and with Unowhy Tools, you can do it with beautiful UI

data.name: deschisdel
data.value: Uninstall the useless "HiSqool" software (In : C:\Program Files\Unowhy)

data.name: deschism
data.value: HiSqool Manager is an embedded software to manage this PC. It's comparable to a malware/spyware

data.name: deschismdel
data.value: Delete the heavy "HiSqool Manager" folder and service (contains the software to manage this PC (Spyware/Malware)) (In : C:\Program Files\Unowhy)

data.name: deschsmlivelog
data.value: Open HiSqool Manager logs view (in live). View HiSqool Manager logs in live (like a verbose mode)

data.name: deschsmpanel
data.value: Open HiSqool Manager panel. View some info about HiSqool Manager like payloads associate with this PC. It's a "hidden" local web page (localhost:7654)

data.name: descinstridfcert
data.value: Unowhy deployed a Root CA (certificate authority) with a payload to not simply log all DNS request, but also decrypt all your web request (HTTPS for example), to simplify, it's to spy you. Yes, it's a big privacy issue and can become a backdoor. The payload also disable Firefox certificate error to not avert user. But don't panic, you can remove, this also block the connection, use your 4G/5G instead or a VPN ? If you have already remove the certificate, you can reintall it, but I don't recommand you to do this

data.name: desclocka
data.value: Enable the ability to lock the user account. For an unknown reason, Unowhy deployed a new version of HiSqoolManager that disable the ability to lock the user account (For exemple, by pressing Win+L). Do this to enable it

data.name: descmas
data.value: A useful open source tool to activate your Windows or Office, change your Windows edition, and more

data.name: descpcname
data.value: Change the Windows name of this PC (NETBIOS)

data.name: descpsbr
data.value: !!! Warning: For some PCs powershell backup does not work, use DISM backup instead !!! This tools is currently in test (in beta) but probably work. Backup and Restore drivers with PowerShell. Always, make a backup of drivers in order to fix possibly drivers problems. This will backup or restore all your system drivers by the way of Power Shell commands with user friendly GUI

data.name: descridf
data.value: Delete the first logon script and video folder (In : C:\ProgramData)

data.name: descridfcertdel
data.value: Delete "RIDF" root certificate authority. Unowhy deployed a Root CA (certificate authority) with a payload to not simply log all DNS request, but also decrypt all your web request (HTTPS for example), to simplify, it's to spy you. Yes, it's a big privacy issue and can become a backdoor. The payload also disable Firefox certificate error to not avert user. But don't panic, you can remove it, this also block the connection, use your 4G/5G instead or a VPN ?

data.name: descrufus
data.value: The best open source tool to make bootable USB

data.name: descshell
data.value: Do this before modify somethings else ! If you have an boot issue (black screen with only cursor) or if you want to bypass the GRDP agreement, do this

data.name: descstart
data.value: Do this before delete "TO_INSTALL". If you have error at boot (File "silent_*.vbs.lnk" not found), do this. Those files are for the auto install of your school's textbooks (In : C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\Windows\Start Menu\Programs\Startup)

data.name: desctaskmgr
data.value: Enable the Task Manager. For an unknown reason, Unowhy deployed a new version of HiSqoolManager that disable the Task Manager. Do this to enable it

data.name: desctidel
data.value: Delete school's texbooks installers folder (In : C:\Program Data\Unowhy)

data.name: descverbstatena
data.value: Enable Windows verbose status to view details about the status of LogonUI (Logon, Startup, Shutdown, Logoff, and more...)

data.name: descwindefset
data.value: Windows Defender settings. Enable and disable the built-in Windows antivirus. In some case (if you are developer, crack your softwares, manipulate unsigned softwares or if there is a false positif), Windows Defender can annoy you by deleting files, kill processes and more, so the correct solution would be to disable it, but it's impossible to deactivate it natively and deactivate the real-time protection is useless, because it reactivates all the time. However, you can permanently disable the real-time protection with a hidden way. Warning: You can disable real-time protection, but you can't disable Windows Defender itself permanently, because it's a Windows Serveur (and Enterprise maybe) feature. Disabling real-time protection is sufficient. To manipulate Windows Defender settings, you need to disable tamper protection. Update: Since Unowhy Tools 24.10 and Unowhy Tools Service 3.2, you can now disable Windows Defender permanently

data.name: descwinre
data.value: Do this if you want to reset Windows. Unowhy has deployed a patch to disable Windows Recovery Environment (to disable reset). For some users, the activation will fail, in this case, you should be able to repair the problem by downloading a WinRE image

data.name: dismdrv
data.value: Backup and Restore drivers with DISM

data.name: dismdrv.title
data.value: DISM Drv GUI for Unowhy Tools

data.name: drvbr
data.value: Backup and restore your PC's drivers. To avoid any driver problems in the future, make a backup of your PC's drivers and in case of problems restore them. However, you can restore from a cloud backup

data.name: extregionchange
data.value: The file extension has been changed to allow you (and Unowhy Tools) to know from which region it comes, don't touch it

data.name: hsmlivelog
data.value: Open HiSqool Manager logs view (in live)

data.name: locka
data.value: Enable the ability to lock the user account

data.name: needres
data.value: Unowhy Tools need some resources from internet. Press "OK" to continue

data.name: nohackbgrt
data.value: HackBGRT is not installed. Do you want to get the splash screen of the BIOS ? (This will take a few minute)

data.name: noid
data.value: Your PC's serial number was not found, make sure you entered your serial number correctly

data.name: pcname
data.value: Change Windows name of this PC

data.name: psdrv
data.value: Backup and Restore drivers with PS

data.name: psdrv.title
data.value: PS Drv GUI for Unowhy Tools

data.name: quicklaunchsavedesc
data.value: Right click to set to default

data.name: rebootmsg
data.value: To finalize the action, your computer needs to reboot. Save your work, then click "OK"

data.name: regionselectwarn
data.value: Select region carefully depending on your file. If you don't select the right region, you can brick your PC !!!

data.name: securebootwarn
data.value: Secure Boot is enabled, you need to disable Secure Boot in BIOS to boot properly with HackBGRT. You can continue, but you need to enroll an Certificate to the BIOS. Do you want to continue ?

data.name: spacepc
data.value: You need more free space on your PC

data.name: spaceusb
data.value: You need more free space on your PC/Devices

data.name: utbdumpwarn
data.value: Do you want to dump the EEPROM of this PC to a file

data.name: utbflashwarn
data.value: Please connect an charger to the PC to prevent any fail. Don't close Unowhy Tools during the process. If the flash fail, your PC can no boot. After flash done, your PC will be reboot. Do you want to flash this EEPROM file to this PC

data.name: windefsettamper
data.value: To disable Windows Defender, you need to disable tamper protection. Unowhy Tools will open Windows Defender settings for you, temper protection is the last switch. Click "Ok" to continue

data.name: winre.title
data.value: WinRE settings GUI for Unowhy Tools

data.name: winremsg
data.value: WinRE image was not found, click "Repair" to fix issue (600 MB required)
